instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

definitions.820-4942: What is 820-4942? a LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER.
definitions.PLT_RESET_L: What is PLT_RESET_L? PLT_RESET_L is platform reset, this signal keeps the system from POSTing. _L means the signal is asserted when its voltage is low. .

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-4942</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>  draws 500 mah
threads.message:
I have a <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-4942</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> pulls 500 mah, no liquid just shut off on customer.
Has 3.3 on all sys power good and cpu getting warm. New to this board what do you guys need to help with this one?

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-4942</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>  draws 500 mah
threads.message:
So board turns on.
Did you check external video and USB activity?

<SIGNAL>PLT_RESET_L</SIGNAL> goes high?

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-4942</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>  draws 500 mah
threads.message: I did not, will in the am

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-4942</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>  draws 500 mah
threads.message: Update reassembled and mac now beeps 3 times

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-4942</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>  draws 500 mah
threads.message:
Puff, RAM error; which can also be caused by CPU.
You should reball all RAM chips, are not too many on this board.

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-4942</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>  draws 500 mah
threads.message: I reflowwed them and it booted. So will pull and reball.

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-4942</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>  draws 500 mah
threads.message:
Reball complete. Testing now no beeps and fast..
Is this issue common?

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-4942</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>  draws 500 mah
threads.message: Not so common for this board...

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-4942</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>  draws 500 mah
